page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: WE HAVE THE RAILWAY STATION IN OUR AREA,THIS RAILWAY LINE JOINS WITH THE MAIN LINE OUTSIDE REDDITCH AT A JUNCTION CALLED BARNT GREEN.MANY PEOPLE USE THE RAILWAY TO COMMUTE TO BIRMINGHAM.RECENTLY PEOPLE FROM BIRMINGHAM HAVE BEEN USING THE TRAIN TO COME SHOPPING IN REDDITCH.THE BUS STATION IS ALSO IN OUR DISTRICT,IT IS VERY CLOSE TO THE RAILWAY STATION.LOCAL BUSES,AND BUSES LINKING WITH LOCAL TOWNS USE THIS BUS STATION.MOST FAMILIES HAVE A CAR,SOME HAVE 2 CARS.OTHER FORMS OF TRANSPORT USED INCLUDE MOTORBIKES,BICYCLES,AND THE TAXI SERVICE.THERE IS A COACH SERVICE TO BIRMINGHAM AIRPORT THE ROADS AROUND REDDITCH ARE MAINLY DUAL-CARRIGEWAY,THIS MEANS THAT DRIVING IS USUALLY SAFE WITH FEW TRAFFIC JAMS.
